subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer beat David Ferrer to win his sixth title at the Western & Southern Open, while Serena Williams finally claimed a championship that had eluded her by defeating Ana Ivanovic.
snippet: Roger Federer beat David Ferrer to win his sixth title at the Western & Southern Open, while Serena Williams finally claimed a championship that had eluded her by defeating Ana Ivanovic.
